DataElement.preferredName: Provider Communication Participant Family Member Skin Exam Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text indicator to signify the exchange of information between health care providers with a participant about his/her family members' skin examinations.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Participant Provider Communication Participant Family Member Skin Exam
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Exchange of information between health care provider and participant about his/her family members' skin examinations.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Persons who provides health care as part of their job responsibilities, or a person or organization who is licensed to supply health care.:the exchange of information between objects, people, or groups.

Concepts.definition: Persons who provides health care as part of their job responsibilities: or a person or organization who is licensed to supply health care.
The exchange of information between objects, people, or groups.

Property.preferredDefinition: Someone who takes part in an activity.:A member of the fundamental unit of society designed primarily to regulate sexual behavior and reproduce, nurture, protect, and socialize the youngs, traditionally organized around kinship ties, descend from the common progenitor or related by marriage or by a feeling of closeness; or of any of various social units differing from but regarded as equivalent to the traditional family.:1. An organ and the enveloping membrane of the body; includes, in addition to the epidermis and dermis, all of the derivatives of the epidermis, e.g., hairs, nails, sudoriferous and sebaceous glands, and mammary glands. Subdivisions of the skin surround various body parts; as a whole, the skin constitutes the external surface of the body. 2. The rind, capsule, or covering of any body or part.:An appraisal or evaluation of a patient's condition by a physician or registered nurse, based on clinical and laboratory data, medical history, and the patient's account of symptoms.  2. The process by which a patient's condition is appraised or evaluated. (Taber's)

Concepts.definition: Someone who takes part in an activity.
Any of the individuals who are descended from a common progenitor, related by marriage or other legal tie, or by a feeling of closeness.
An organ that constitutes the external surface of the body. It consists of the epidermis, dermis, and skin appendages.
An appraisal or evaluation of a patient's condition by a clinician that is based on a physical exam, medical history, and the patient's account of symptoms.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Observations and activities relating to behavior, such as smoking and ETOH use.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated to support Arizona Cancer Center adoption of C3D
